settings.title: Fifty-million straws are discarded each year in the US alone.
settings.bodycopy:
The only way to move forward on planet Earth is to do so sustainably; we truly believe this, and so lays the foundation for our entire concept.

Each item’s loving purpose is both with the users’ and our environment’s best interest in mind.
settings.headline_2: The beauty in small, daily items is not mundane. Everything we use on a regular basis should align with a doctrine of ethos that honors our planet and its limited resources. It’s ok to start small.

settings.bodycopy_1: Everything we use can be striking and timeless, just like mother nature itself. Form and function perseveres with great care. So let's start taking care of our things, and our planet.
